= Version 0.94.410 - More bugfixes =
  * Released: 2012-05-22 16:30 CET
  * Welcome *Sigee15* in the project as committer.
  * Diplomacy screen is now fully functional ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=210 Issue #210])
  * AI players now nag you with diplomatic messages ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=211 Issue #211])
  * Added generic objectives for level 2 to set the main course ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=325 Issue #325])
  * Financial information sums added ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=407 Issue #407])
  * Fixed scrolling of messages in the bridge message panel ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=437 Issue #437])
  * Fixed notification about research being stopped due lack of something ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=438 Issue #438])
  * Fixed AI managed player planets not replacing and slowly adding buildings ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=439 Issue #439])
  * Fixed missing traders in protect mission 2 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=440 Issue #440])
  * Fixed crash in smuggler mission 9 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=441 Issue #441])
  * Fixed cases where the Thorin mission 5 would leave the controllable area before the garthogs catch up, leaving the player unable to attack ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=443 Issue #443])
  * Fixed issue where trader fleets forgot where they came from ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=444 Issue #444])
  * Fixed bridge animation not properly showing the message panel after closing it ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=450 Issue #450])
  * Clicking on record message during mission 15 (spy) now instantly completes the mission instead of the need to resume the game ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=451 Issue #451])
  * Fixed the Launcher reporting file access errors in certain cases ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=457 Issue #457/1])
  * Fixed cases where planet progress simulation crashed the game ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=457 Issue #457/2])
  * Fixed the crash due invalid chat references during virus mission 12 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=458 Issue #458])
  * Trader #4 now cures an infected planet when allowed to land ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=460 Issue #460]). Use the chat to figure out which one is it :)
  * Fixed missing chat labels ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=461 Issue #461])
  * 

= Version 0.94.400 - Bug fixes =
  * Released: 2012-05-13 18:00 CET
  * This is *NOT* the Beta yet.
  * Higher quality music by Norbert "Silver83" Pellny ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=428 Issue #428])
  * Notification if a research stops due lack of money or lab ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=295 Issue #295])
  * AI now sends diplomatic messages ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=321 Issue #321])
  * Spacewar Grid rendering ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=323 Issue #323])
  * Mission 7 related crashes fixed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=340 Issue #340])
  * Added missing cutscene for Mission 2 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=343 Issue #343])

  * Bridge on Level 2 now has equipment and information areas ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=352 Issue #352])
  * Mission 9 (smuggler) adjusted ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=362 Issue #362])
  * Pending battles are now saved and loaded (e.g., AI vs. AI or multiple attacks happening at the same time) ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=372 Issue #372])
  * Trader ship names now change with the game language settings ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=377 Issue #377])
  * Fixed bad original audio for the conversation with Kelly ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=378 Issue #378])
  * Mission 11 attack incoming message now happens earlier ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=382 Issue #382])
  * Garthog fleet now flies away in Mission 11 instead of just disappearing. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=385 Issue #385])
  * Fixed cases when a game save may be corrupted and cause error reports ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=388 Issue #388])
  * Mission 11 now allows two planets to be infected before you get fired ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=398 Issue #398])

  * Subsequent statusbar messages now show up without interruption ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=402 Issue #402])
  * Building fractional production display corrected ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=406 Issue #406])
  * Label typo fixes ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=412 Issue #412])
  * Mission 2 pirate attacks now timeout properly ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=416 Issue #416])
  * The X key resets the UI scaling only when the visual page is shown on the options screen ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=418 Issue #418])
  * Mission 4 and Mission 19 chat now affects the attackers by switching targets ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=419 Issue #419])
  * Audio warning added to Mission 3 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=421 Issue #421])
  * Crash when joining fleets ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=422 Issue #422])
  * Toggle fullscreen mode checkbox added to options screen ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=424 Issue #424])
  * Fixed AI attacking a demolished building indefinitely ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=425 Issue #425])
  * Fixed crash in battle statistics after ground battle ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=429 Issue #429])
  * Traders now have more speed, fleets without hyperdrive travel now faster ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=432 Issue #432])
  * Added option to allow skipping cutscenes with the mouse click (default off) ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=434 Issue #434])
  * Toggle fullscreen from options caused menu and control problems ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=435 Issue #435])

= Version 0.94.350 - Basic diplomacy =
  * Released: 2012-04-09 10:30 CET
  * *I recommend starting a new game as some gameplay mechanic changes and fixes might not take effect under existing saves*. 
  * Added smoke and fire to buildings ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=73 Issue #73])
  * Added ability to set the game base speed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=153 Issue #153])
  * Few settings has been moved from Gameplay to Sound page in Options.
  * Multi headed rocket have an area effect ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=180 Issue #180])
  * Rockets and bombs have cooldown now as well ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=192 Issue #192])
  * Groundwar damaged units now emit smoke and fire ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=274 Issue #274])
  * AI now uses its rockets, but won't target campaign related ships ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=300 Issue #300])
  * Space stations have now specific equipment slot for rockets, which must be manually refilled or let the auto-refill take care of it.
  * Information screen tabs can be accessed via QWERASDF keys ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=309  Issue #309])
  * Debug functionality CTRL+M has been removed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=312 Issue #312])
  * Skirmish games may now be resumed after the win condition ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=305 Issue #305])
  * Added extra video message to Mission 21 ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=306 Issue #306])
  * Changed "AI managed" auto-build settings to consider all such planets instead of individually manage them (similarly to regular AI players) ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=316 Issue #316])
  * Ability auto-upgrade planet defenses, similar to fleets ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=318 Issue #318])
  * The player's main fleet is now named according to the current language when a new game is started.
  * Fixed production screen showing wrong capacity in case no orbital factory was deployed yet.
  * Changed tax mechanics to boost taxes when the player has few planets and reduce taxes when the player has 10+ planets.


= Version 0.94.320 - Campaign finished =
  * Released: 2012-03-06 15:30 CET
  * Added planet dependant population growth and display of the rate in the information panels ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=69 Issue #69])
  * Added demand for fire brigade, look for the small fire icons ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=71 Issue #71])

  * Reduced the effects of battle on the planet population ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=186 Issue #186])

  * Added ability to deploy ground units continuously by holding the left mouse button ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=261 Issue 261])
  * Idle ships will fire at rockets and bombs ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=298 Issue #298])

  * Building under construction now uses mixed scaffolding ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=272 Issue #272])
  * The main campaign and single player campaign features the Game over screen with option to resume the current gameplay ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=301 Issue #301]).
  * Disable subtitles in options ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=302 Issue #302])
  * Settings to slow down the game in case of an incoming attack ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=282 Issue 282])

= Version 0.94.160 - Fixes =
  * Released: 2012-01-29 17:00 CET
  * Fixed ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=190 Issue #190], [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=267 Issue #267]), auto-refill of bombs and rockets settings did not work correctly.

If you managed to do a close escort, this will surely result in a space battle within a few seconds.

  * Fixed issues with Mission 9. ([http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=244 Issue #244])

  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=246 Issue #246], unable to create and equip new fleets.

  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=260 Issue #260], fire rockets from starbases, auto-refill of starbases too

  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=264 Issue #264], rockets were selectable and stoppable in spacewar.

  * Fixed [http://code.google.com/p/open-ig/issues/detail?id=270 Issue #270], attack command in spacewar affected all ships, not just the selected ones.

= Version 0.94 - Missions =
  * Released: 2012-01-15 13:00 CET
  * *Acknowledgement: Joe did a great job for this release!*
  * *You may need to start a new game!*. If you want to carry on with your previous Main Campaign progress, you can edit your save XML and change the {{{<world game='campaign/main'}}} to {{{<world game='campaign/main2'}}} in the root node manually.
